AI Bots.title: AI Bots
AI Bots.description: AI Bots in CometChat are designed to facilitate conversations with users. Each AI Bot is associated with a specific AI Instruction.

AI Instructions.title: AI Instructions
AI Instructions.description: CometChat AI Instructions can be linked to a bot to confer specific characteristics upon it.

bots/index.title: Non-AI Bots
bots/index.description: In CometChat, non-AI bots are unique users capable of autonomously sending and receiving messages.
